===See also=== :;[https://openwrt.org/toh/draytek/vigor2830_series DrayTek Vigor 2830 series] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/draytek/vigor2760 2760 series] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2710]] * :CPU: [[Lantiq]] PSB 50610 @333MHz, 8/32MB, 12V/0.8A *[[DrayTek Vigor 2720]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2720Vn]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2760]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2760n]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2760Vn]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2820]] * :DrayTek Vigor 2710, DrayTek Vigor 2820, DrayTek Vigor 2830, DrayTek Vigor 2920 :[[Infineon]] PSB 50702 (Danube) / PSB 50712 (Danube-S) *[[DrayTek Vigor 2820Vn]] :FCC ID: JCK-GN-WS31N-RH (2008-04-16) *[[DrayTek Vigor 2830]] * *[[DrayTek Vigor 2830n]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2830n plus]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2830Vn]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2830Vn plus]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2832]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2832n]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2912]] • [https://routerchart.com/draytek/draytek-vigor-2912n-v2912n-301 Spec.] :CPU: [[Ralink]] RT6856 @700MHz, 4/64MB, 1x USB 2.0 port, 12V/1A *[[DrayTek Vigor 2920]] * ---- *[[DrayTek Vigor 2110]] • [http://netobzor.org/forum/index.php?topic=11011.0 PCB] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2110n]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2110Vn]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2130]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2130n]] • [https://routerchart.com/draytek/draytek-vigor-2130n-v2130n-340 Spec.] • [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31132-draytek-vigor-2130n-reviewed SNB Review] :CPU: [[Vitesse]] VSC7501 (ARM926EJ-S), 8/64MB, 1x USB 2.0 port, 12V/1.5A :SW: [[Vitesse]] VSC8601 - Gigabit Ethernet PHY (WAN) :WiFi: [[MSI MP11BGN (MS-6893)]] • Mini PCI Card :WLAN: [[Ralink]] RT2880F/RT2820 2T3R (2.4GHz) *[[DrayTek Vigor 2130Vn]]
